title: Harris and Hughes on Danse Africaine - connection

content.question: Which of the following best describes a connection between Source 1 and Source 2?

choices.label: Both sources consider Africa as a place where humans are as wild as animals.
Both sources explore the influence of Africa on African American identity.
Both sources argue that African American writers must travel to Africa to write about it.
Both sources caution against using the influence of white writers to represent African American identities.

content.answer: Both sources explore the influence of Africa on African American identity.

topic.text: 3.13: Envisioning Africa in Harlem Renaissance Poetry

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
